reviewText: This is basically one full body workout using light weights.  I was hoping there were a couple of different workouts - more like her show, where different body parts were worked out at different times.  Not sure I'll be using this is my large collection that I rotate.  I'm still DVR'ing the TV show, which I prefer much more.

Not worth the money. No where near as good as the television broadcast. Good only if you want a non-exertion exercise video. Workouts are short and not the least bit challenging. I'm disappointed because I loved the TV Broadcast way back when.
this tape was in very good condition.  i use to watch her workouts on pbs.  i love the fact that she works every muscle group.  this tape is a must have.
